DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multicenter , non-randomized observational study subject 18 year old undergo RF ablation drug refractory recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) .
DOC.brief_title: CARTO® 3 System Real Time Intracardiac Ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: This study purpose measure `` real world '' acute procedural outcome ( procedural efficiency acute safety ) associate use CARTO® 3 System real time intracardiac ultrasound clinical setting subject drug refractory recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal AF .
DOC.criteria: Drug refractory , recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal AF Age 18 year old Patients able willing provide write informed consent participate study comply study requirement Atrial fibrillation secondary electrolyte imbalance , thyroid disease , reversible noncardiac cause Previous ablation atrial fibrillation AF episodes last longer 30 day Uncontrolled heart failure , NYHA Class III IV heart failure Documented intraatrial thrombus abnormality preablation image Contraindication anticoagulation Stroke , cardiac surgery , unstable angina , myocardial infarction percutaneous coronary intervention within past 3 month Awaiting cardiac transplantation Heart disease corrective surgery anticipate within 6 month Enrollment investigational drug device study Subjects unwilling comply protocol followup requirement Patients pregnant
